LanguageData.Alien_Heyra.label: Heyra
LanguageData.Alien_Heyra.description: Heyras settled in Rimworld a long time ago. They possess a unique psychic ability to, occasionally, hear whispers in their heads. Despite these whispers being mostly scattered words, Heyras believe they are the oracles of God. We do not know if these whispers are real. But it is confirmed that Heyras have a higher psychic sensitivity than humans.
LanguageData.Alien_Heyra.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Heyra.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Heyra.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.Alien_Heyra.tools.3.label: horns
LanguageData.Alien_Heyra_Rong.label: Rong
LanguageData.Alien_Heyra_Rong.description: These savage barbarians are the nemesis of Heyras. They have thrown away the sense of moral and pursuit the primal pleasure. A series of evidence indicates that Rong is a separated branch of Heyra, although the Supreme Hierarch of Heyra denies this in all her strength.
LanguageData.Alien_Heyra_Rong.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Heyra_Rong.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Heyra_Rong.tools.2.label: teeth
